original_text: And those of you who are left shall rot away in your enemies' lands because of their iniquity, and also because of the iniquities of their fathers they shall rot away like them.
korean_text: 너희 남은 자가 너희의 원수들의 땅에서 자기의 죄로 말미암아 쇠잔하며 그 조상의 죄로 말미암아 그 조상 같이 쇠잔하리라

sentences.original_text: And those of you who are left
shall rot away in your enemies' lands
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수의 땅에서 썩어 없어질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and also because of the iniquities of their fathers
they shall rot away like them.
